title: Apply Vertical Blinds gallery/media setup to Parquet Flooring service

requirements.text: Create a new generated static image asset for the Parquet Flooring service and place it under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in the image requirements.

quotes: nice.. now add this to parquet flooring service

acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg.
The app can load the image via the existing public asset loading approach (served from the frontend public directory).

requirements.text: Add a new gallery media item for the Parquet Flooring category so it can be rendered by the existing MediaStrip component.

quotes: nice.. now add this to parquet flooring service

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts includes at least one new GalleryItem with category set to "parquet-flooring".
The new GalleryItem references the generated parquet flooring image path "assets/generated/parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg".
The GalleryItem id is unique within galleryMedia.

requirements.text: Enable media rendering for the Parquet Flooring entry in the Services page "Additional Offerings" section by wiring it to the Parquet Flooring media category.

quotes: nice.. now add this to parquet flooring service

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/services.ts sets the Parquet Flooring additionalOfferings entry mediaCategory to "parquet-flooring".
On the Services page, the Parquet Flooring card in Additional Offerings renders a MediaStrip and displays the parquet flooring media item(s).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No new routing/pages beyond wiring Parquet Flooring media into existing Services page sections.

required: Parquet flooring in a bright modern interior photo (parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg)
